representation_information.name: Band Sequential (BSQ) Image File
representation_information.description: A basic binary raster image format used in multiband satellite imagery. The BSQ format stores information for the image one band at a time. In other words, data for all the pixels for band 1 is stored first, then data for all pixels for band 2, and so on.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
